name: Slider Path for Elementor
author: Rashid87

sections.description:
Slider Path for Elementor to enrich widgets features of elementor.Slider Path will give you unlimited options of slider choice. you may edit control of the full slider with the default style. All category has Different Slider.

Features Includes

  • Number or Ready Sliders
  • Automatic Settings and Style
  • Custom of Elementor and Slides
  • Responsive and Device Friendly Design
  • Get Support Instant
  • All Category of Slider you will get
  • NO Coding Requers
  • Easy Demo Import
  • Cron Job Demo Import tLibrary
  • Modern Design

How to use it

  • Go to Library
  • Check the Slider
  • Preview the Slider
  • Import and Ready to Use

Demo

Here is the Demo Link

  • Slider Demo
sections.installation:
1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress and enjoy
sections.faq:
Do I need Elementor plugin to be activated

Yes. As this is an addon of Elementor you must installed and activated the Elementor plugin
